history.proof: intros f g x Hloc Hf. destruct Hf as [lf Hf]. exists lf. srun best use: is_derive_ext_loc unfold: locally.

ctx: intros f g x Hloc Hf.
exceptions.tactic: apply (filterdiff_ext_loc f g x lf Hloc Hf).
exceptions.exn: In environment K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K f, g : K -> V x : K Hloc : locally x (fun t : K => f t = g t) lf : V Hf : is_derive f x lf The term "x" has type "AbsRing.sort K" while it is expected to have type "AbsRing_NormedModule K -> V".

original: intros f g x Hloc Hf. destruct Hf as [lf Hf]. exists lf. apply (filterdiff_ext_loc f g x lf Hloc Hf).
